page.title: 16Clubs.
page.content: Children's Books. A lot of children in Radyr Primary School read books for a hobby.Every month we have a bookclub in school when we can order books of our choice. They are paperbacks and cost about a pound.A recent idea has been games books which are very popular with boys.A game book does not have a set story like a normal book.It is divided into paragraphs which are numbered. After each paragraph the reader is given a choice of what he wants to happen.The next paragraph you read depends upon what you decide.The reader therefore decides how the story progresses.The stories are always very exciting and usually involve fighting monsters.Dice are used to decide the outcome of the fights.If you lose a fight you die and the story is finished.
